title: Help!!
body: Pls help there is something wrong withe League of legends because when i disconnected from a ranked game i tried going on and it doesnt work it says something wrong for your firewall and i cant join pls help im banned now so yeh 20 mins :(.{{item:3070}}

replies.body: Can't say I'm getting the same problem. Exactly what happens when you try to connect to a game? Are you still experiencing this issue?

I am having a similar problem. I can't reconnect and At least 8 out of the 10 players in my game are experiencing the same issue. I'm basically locked out from starting another game, and I can't even get into the one I was in the middle of.
